评论详情: The product was light, comfortable and was perfect for a hippie costume party. I was 3 months post partum and tried it on with a high waist pants. The top was a little too large so I didn’t keep it but could still make it work. I just knew I wouldn’t wear it more than once so a smaller size would have been better.
It’s a cute top, but wasn’t my style. The material was a little cheap. Returned it.
This was cute for a 70s look, but a large fit like a small. Size up!
Im 195ish. 5'4. 34 DDD. I wore this mid August is Georgia. I wasnt hot at all. It's thin and light weight. The top part rolls up a bit, so some double sided fabric tape might be useful.

Purchased for a 70's party. As others have mentioned it is pretty short, but the design makes up for that. I love the long, and perfectly belled sleeves. The blouse does have a lining inside. I wore a tan tank top underneath due to the length, and it looked great. It's very pretty, and very 70'S.
This shirt was the perfect piece I needed to go with my 70's outfit!!! It was the perfect match with my bell bottom jeans and the awesome wig I wore!!! The quality was great!!!
Thi shirt runs so small order 3 sizes up
Fits at waist and chest, but can’t even get it around my shoulders. I do have broad-ish shoulders…but still really disappointed as I was super excited to wear this…
The material of this top is very comfortable. It fits well and the description was on point.
Bought this for my daughter’s high school 70’s theme party it was a hit!
XL fits like a small :( super cute top, such a bummer.
